version.new: ActionHandler::forward($action) can now be called from within an action to continue execution.
Services::registerObjectAsService() allows you to register an already-instantiated object as a service.
version.change: Services::requireService() now returns the started service.
LanguageLocalizer files can now have comments (designated by '#') and keys/values are trimmed.
Harmoni->execute() now returns the result from the action if outputHTML = false.
DebugHandlers now store an internal output level which is used when none is passed to the Printer.
LoginState now keeps track of both an Active and Logged-in agent.
Layouts & other VisualComponents now have setLevel() and getLevel() methods and store the level locally.
Template->output() now accepts a variable length argument list of FieldSets or hash tables.
Actions are now passed a reference to the Harmoni object.
version.new: Databases now have a toDBDate() and fromDBDate() function to convert to the necessary Date format.
Completed ActionHandler, LoginHandler and Harmoni classes and services.
version.change: Deprecated the createDatabase() method in DBHandler. Use addDatabase(), instead. This change was provoked by the fact that Oracle requires different arguments to instantiate the DB object.
Finished Layout, Theme and Template.
AuthenticationMethod includes changed to avoid random unprintable character output.
FieldSetValidator and RuleSet now take optional argument on validate()/validateAll() functions specifying if errors should be thrown upon failure or not.
RuleSet can now accept an ErrorHandler to use via setErrorHandler().
version.new: DBHandler can now use a PostgreSQL server and fetching last insert ID works on all integrated DBs.
version.change: layoutHandler now works. Theme integration is to come.
version.new: Added interfaces for: VisualComponent, Layout, Menu, Content -- all part of the LayoutHandler.
version.change: AuthenticationResult now holds authenticated agent's system name as well as valid methods.
AgentInformationHandler now handles compiling of search results and returns the appropriate array format.
AuthenticationMethod::getAgentInformation now returns an associative array of [username]=>array([key1]=>value1,...),...
version.new: ChangeLog now held in an XML file and translated by XSL!

version.change: Changed AuthenticationMethod to allow for getAgentInformation(username,searchMode) so that one can search for a username/fullname etc as well as get information for a single entry.
Updated DB and LDAP AuthenticationMethods to allow for user-info searching & tested backwards compatibility.
Changed naming scheme of packages so that they describe more clearly what they DO as opposed to what they CONTAIN.
